BisCorePropertyMappingsCustomAttribute.description: Used to specify OpenPlant Schema property mappings that map to BIS Core properties.  Overriding BIS Core properties to add custom attributes causes the propert to be added as a shared column attribute

properties.description: List of BisCore property mappings, format "BisCorePropName,OpenPlantPropertyName;BisCorePropName,OpenPlantPropertyName"
properties.name: BisCorePropertyMappings

MappingOriginCustomAttribute.description: Used to specify OpenPlant Schema class and property origin for this schema
MappingOriginCustomAttribute.label: Mapping Origin Custom Attribute

properties.description: Name of OpenPlant equivalent class or property
properties.label: Origin Name
properties.name: OriginName

properties.description: Additional OpenPlant class or property names, multiple entries separated by a semicolon
properties.label: Additional Names
properties.name: AdditionalNames
